title: /verbosity:minimal on Linux with /m shows command lines
body:
### Steps to reproduce

Build.csproj contents:
```xml
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
  <PropertyGroup>
    <OutputType>Exe</OutputType>
    <TargetFrameworks>net452;netcoreapp2.0</TargetFrameworks>
  </PropertyGroup>
</Project>
```

Directory contents:
```
/
- Build.csproj
- Test.cs
```

Test.cs contents:
```csharp
using System;

public class Program {
    public static int Main(string[] args) {
        foreach(var arg in args) {
            Console.WriteLine($"{arg}");
        }
        return 0;
    }
}
```

Command line
```
msbuild /m Build.csproj
```
### Expected  behavior

```
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 15.1.8.0 ( Wed Sep  5 19:27:37 UTC 2018) for
Mono
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

  Build -> /home/USER/Projects/msbuild/bin/Debug/net452/Build.exe
  Build -> /home/USER/Projects/msbuild/bin/Debug/netcoreapp2.0/Build.dll
```

### Actual behavior

```
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 15.1.8.0 ( Wed Sep  5 19:27:37 UTC 2018) for Mono
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

/usr/lib/mono/msbuild/15.0/bin/Roslyn/csc.exe /noconfig /unsafe- /checked- /nowarn:1701,1702,1701,1702 /nostdlib+ /errorreport:prompt /warn:4 /define:TRACE;DEBUG;NETFRAMEWORK;NET452 /highentropyva+ /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/mscorlib.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.Core.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.Data.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.Drawing.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.IO.Compression.FileSystem.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.Numerics.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.Runtime.Serialization.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.Xml.dll /reference:/usr/lib/mono/4.5.2-api/System.Xml.Linq.dll /debug+ /debug:portable /filealign:512 /optimize- /out:obj/Debug/net452/Build.exe /subsystemversion:6.00 /target:exe /warnaserror- /utf8output /deterministic+ Test.cs "/tmp/.NETFramework,Version=v4.5.2.AssemblyAttributes.cs" obj/Debug/net452/Build.AssemblyInfo.cs /warnaserror+:NU1605

Build -> /home/USER/Projects/msbuild/bin/Debug/netcoreapp2.0/Build.dll
```

When running without the `/m` flag, the command lines are not shown in the output. It also only shows the additional output if building for the first time, or after `/t:Clean` is run, otherwise it only shows the expected minimal output.

### Environment data

```
$msbuild /version
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 15.1.8.0 ( Wed Sep  5 19:27:37 UTC 2018) for Mono

15.1.8.0
```

OS info:
`Linux MACHINE 4.15.0-34-generic #37-Ubuntu SMP Mon Aug 27 15:21:48 UTC 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux`

nodes.body: This is still an issue, is it going to be addressed?
@radical can you take a look at this?
This is _still_ an issue. Any ideas on when it might be addressed?
Actually, was the `/m` switch removed? It seems like `/v:m` works.
